text: Maciej Tomasz Grubski (20 August 1968 – 17 December 2020) was a Polish politician. He was a member of the Civic Platform. From 2007 to 2019, Grubski was a member of the Senate of Poland. Grubski was born in Łódź, Poland. Grubski died on 17 December 2020 in Łódź from COVID-19 at the age of 52. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Łódź Category:Politicians from Łódź
title: Maciej Grubski
